content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-5.5, 19.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5), currently not connected
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0), working with coal fuel
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5), working
- Pipe Group (Steam) connecting the boiler to the steam engine, working
- Pipe Group (Water) connecting the offshore pump to the boiler, working
- Small Electric Poles at positions (-7.5, 22.5), (-6.5, 22.5), and (-1.5, 20.5), not fully connected to the electric network

### Iron Plate Production at Position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0), currently has no ingredients to smelt

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Connecting Pipes
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. Harvest and craft additional pipes if necessary.
- Verify that the connection path between entities is clear and that the entities are correctly aligned for connection.

### Errors when Inserting Items
- Before inserting items into an entity, ensure that the items are available in your inventory.

### Errors when Placing Entities
- Verify that you have the required entity in your inventory before attempting to place it on the map.

### Errors with Electric Network
- Ensure that all electric poles are properly connected to form a complete electric network. Check that the poles are within range to connect to each other and to the entities requiring power.

### Assertion Errors
- Regularly check the status of your entities to ensure they are working as expected. If an entity is not working, investigate and resolve any underlying issues such as missing connections or insufficient resources.
